Hi, my name is Max Hamulyák, and I'd like to welcome you to my website. I am a Software Engineer in the Netherlands, presently employed by Lateral Group. In my spare time, I also like to blog on Kaylumah, a company I founded in 2020.

You'll find the ideas, thoughts, experiments and ramblings I wanted to share. Most directly inspired by experiences during my career. The main focuses of the blog are .NET, quality and testing.
